value.description: When multi value present, this contains one of the value

category.description: The category of the table, such as [TiDB]

instances.description: Instances in the current host. The key is instance address

partitions.description:
Containing unused partitions. The key is path in lower case.
Note: deviceName is not used as the key, since TiDB and TiKV may return different deviceName for the same device.

patterns.description:
We use a string array to represent multiple CNF pattern sceniaor like:
SELECT * FROM t WHERE c LIKE '%s%' and c REGEXP '.*a.*' because
Golang and Rust don't support perl-like (?=re1)(?=re2)

started_at.description: The start running time, reset when retry. Used to estimate approximate profiling progress.

plans.description: for showing slow queries in the statement detail page

connection_id.description: TODO: Switch back to uint64 when modern browser as well as Swagger handles BigInt well.

txn_start_ts.description: TODO: Switch back to uint64 when modern browser as well as Swagger handles BigInt well.

avg_backoff_time.description: avg total back off time per sql

avg_cop_process_time.description: avg process time per copr task

avg_cop_wait_time.description: avg wait time per copr task

avg_process_time.description: avg total process time per sql

avg_wait_time.description: avg total wait time per sql

max_backoff_time.description: max back off time per sql
